law.catch_line: Notice of policy return right and premium refund.
law.text: Medicare supplement policies or certificates shall have a notice prominently printed on the first page of the policy or attached thereto stating in substance that the applicant shall have the right to return the policy or certificate within thirty (30) days of its delivery and to have the premium refunded if, after examination of the policy or certificate, the applicant is not satisfied for any reason.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 5, effective February 26, 1982.
